lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: I work for a giant website with lots of different experts writing about hundreds of topics, from health issues to cars to hobbies and more. I work with the writers to keep them happy.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: You are worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctoral student.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I believe people deserve a "fair shake".

lender.name: Ruby
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to encourage people to become independent and gain knowledge and experience through their own ways.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an university student =)

lender.name: Alain et Francine
lender.loan_because: We believe in solidarity. We hope our modest contribution will help hard-working people lead a better life.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a store manager for a printing and shipping company.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: There are many amazing business minds in the world that may not have the funds to make their dream a reality. Every deserves to make their place in the world whether that is through a farm or a salon. We are the masters of our fate!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can...and I know micro financing works

lender.name: Harold
lender.loan_because: A lot of small changes made locally can have a great impact globally

lender.name: Julie and Tom
lender.loan_because: Living in Canada, we are very fortunate and want to help individuals gain economic independance so they may improve their lives.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of our wealth with those much less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I am a Quality Assurance manager with a pharmaceutical company, managing other manufacturers to provide affordable medicines to the Asia Pacific region.

lender.name: Shawn & Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is a good idea to help local business grow all over the world. The success of all these small businesses impacts the quality of life worldwide. We want to do our part.
lender.occupational_info: Shawn builds websites to help teachers. Sarah teaches photography at a college in Washington, DC.

lender.name: Kate McNally
lender.loan_because: It think this is a fantastic initiative ! A hands up, not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for ONE a global advocacy and campaigning organisation that focuses on inssues relating to Africa (and other developing countries), such as aids, trade and debit cancellation.
I am also a volunteer for Food Water Shelter - fws builds & manages sustainable and eco-friendly villages for vulnerable women, their children and orphans - their current project is called Kesho Leo and is in Tanzania, Africa

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed so it is my privilege to be able to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I market, sell, install, develop and train people in the use of context specific software.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be secure in my life, so I am trying to help others and I believe that giving directly to entrepreneurs is more effective than giving to large organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I promote the research of scientists at the University of California, Los Angeles. Research such as targeted medicine delivery, clean energy, water filtration, next generation electronics and computing.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it is needed and is so incredibly successful!
lender.occupational_info: I manage women's education and empowerment programs in the Middle East.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed. God has always provided for our needs and we hope that through our giving God's love and provision will be seen by those who receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work with inner-city youth providing social and academic education that will help them break the negative cycles of violence, drugs, and broken homes. My husband is a minister and school administrator. Everything we do is for the purpose of revealing God's grace and salvation to those who have not yet known this amazing love.

lender.name: Terri
lender.occupation: Compliance Officer for a Hedge Fund

lender.name: RobertPlantFan
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping entrepreneurs get ahead in some small way.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I believe in the value of micro-financing projects that support self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: Helping employers and employees be the best they can be in meeting their business objectives.

lender.name: John P
lender.loan_because: I hope it will better allow the entrepreneurs to improve their businesses and communities

lender.name: Kayecee
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to struggle to feed my family.
lender.occupational_info: During the day, I'm a teacher. At night, I design and sell t-shirts and gifts on the internet.

lender.name: Rik
lender.loan_because: If I were in their shoes I would want someone to help me kick-start my business.
lender.occupational_info: I equip people with the tools to find a job and/or a career.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone else. I believe I'm here on this planet to do just that.

lender.name: Saya
lender.loan_because: I want to make people smile! Especially, I hope to help women and children independent.

lender.name: JFG
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to make a difference.

lender.name: Wilfried
lender.loan_because: We love to travel and have visited many countries. We always love the people we meet during our travels and appreciate how hard people work with so little - and yet how dignified and gracious they have been towards us. It has been greatly enriching in many ways and we feel that it is our responsibility to give something back and to give people a chance. I would like to help people help themselves to make a better life for them and their families. Often all it takes is a foot up, dedication, and hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I immigrated to the USA from Germany on a fiance` visa, with little money, worked in many menial jobs to put some simple foods on the table while my wife went to the University to get her environmental degree. I took over a failing retail business with lots of debt and grew it by taking care of our customers, inspiring and empowering staff. I paid back all that was owed, established good credit, established integrity, initiative, innovation. Later we had several stores and 30 employees and became one of the top companies in our category.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have been born in a rich country and we take it for granted that we are so blessed. I want to help and think this is the best way to empower people and give them a chance to improve their lives.

lender.name: Miche
lender.loan_because:
I love the idea of paying it forward. I feel totally blessed to have been born and raised in Australia and often wonder how fortunate some of us are in comparison to others.
Always remember that when you are tempted to hold back, love flows best when it flows.

lender.name: Schandi
lender.loan_because: people have taken a chance on me when others haven't seen a reason to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a third grade elementary teacher.

lender.name: Nancy & Joe
lender.loan_because: we are blessed to live in a free and prosperous country. We recognize that there are many less fortunate, yet aspiring, fellow human beings that we share this God-given planet with. It is our desire to see the children of tomorrow grow up with the hope of a brighter future!
lender.occupational_info: I, Joe, work for a large non-profit corporation that helps the poor and homeless. I, Nancy, work at a printing and design company.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: In my own small way, I'd like to make a difference

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Ansel
lender.loan_because: I have it pretty good where I live, and I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly focus my time on sleeping, so I have plenty of energy to be cute...which is how I entice humans to give to Kiva entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: We are all equally connected as one spirit, so what I own is already yours.
lender.occupational_info: I help others who grieve for loved ones who have crossed over to heaven.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I feel...everyone should have a chance to do what they want to in life. I feel...If we help the people we know we are doing a good thing. If we don't help the people we know we are doing a bad thing. If we don't help the people we don't know we are doing a horrible thing. If we help people we don't know we are doing a great thing. I feel...that people can do great things even if they are big or small and don't have much means to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am only a sophomore in high school so I only go to school for now but I'm already looking forward to my future.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in entrepreneurship and have also been in the challenging position that these borrowers are in. My wish is for them to grow and prosper.

lender.name: Erin - OverlandHoney
lender.loan_because: I believe that people should help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work a full time office job as an accountant. On the side, I am a Beekeeper. I manage 100+ honey bee colonies and I teach beekeeping to beginners.

lender.name: Aviva and David
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can and many cant
lender.occupational_info: I teach and encourage people to help themselves and to care for others by leading by example

lender.name: raymond
lender.loan_because: To give encouragement and show respect.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed installing tiles and I also dream of success in my art.

lender.name: Honor of B&J Hampton
lender.loan_because: I want to empower parents that live in extreme poverty to be able to better support themselves so that they may in turn be able to educate their children and provide a better life for them as well as themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur who partners with a clothing designer's company to teach women how they can look better, feel better and save money on their wardrobe purchases by making wiser choices

lender.name: Lawrance
lender.loan_because: I give because I believe that every person has the obligation and privilege, to the best of his/her ability and resources, to make the world more just, peaceful and sustainable place for everyone. I believe every human is entitled to adequate food, shelter, and safety.
lender.occupational_info: For me, social work is helping people find their own strengths towards achieving their life goals.

lender.name: Judy & Scarlett
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to fulfill their dreams

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: it's a rewarding and practical way to enable hard-working people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Aviation Industry

lender.name: robyn
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day, Teach him to fish and you feed him for life"
lender.occupational_info: Growing trees can be a long, hard work but definately worth all the effort when you see a seed you have sown, grow to a magnificent tree, that everyone will benefit from and enjoy.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to become independent, successful, and to live their best life possible. Also, giving is the best feeling ever!
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals and couples to heal hurts from their past, and to create the happy and extraordinary lives they seek for themselves.

lender.name: Don & Peta
lender.loan_because: Of the fantastic opportunity provided by Kiva to make a direct and personal difference.

lender.name: Agate
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: Web Hosting services. Servers and co-location.

lender.name: Rishad
lender.loan_because: I owe my life to entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I study, or at least attempt to.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I'm a Blessed person, I need to share. It's a gift to give

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: There are so many people around the world who need and deserve a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I build and support software and websites.

lender.name: the Bradshaw family
lender.loan_because: Charity separates the rich from the poor; aid raises the needy and sets him on the same level with the rich - EVA PERON
lender.occupational_info: Daniel works in account management and Ellen stays at home with our 2 and 3 year old daughters..

lender.name: Emma I
lender.occupational_info: Working with creative film makers and artists to produce visual effects for feature films, commercials and music videos.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Grassroots innovation is the key to sustained economic growth.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am an English teacher in Watarai Japan. I teach at an Elementary school, a Junior High School as well as a community class once a month.

lender.name: John & Joan
lender.loan_because: Playing a small part in someone's dreams and goals is very rewarding.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for the blessed life that I have. I lend to pay forward as my success is solely because others have believed in me.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate for items that my company needs in which to operate on a global basis.

lender.name: Bec
lender.loan_because: I can. Because we are all connected and we should help support each other.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a lawyer working with Aboriginal Australians.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: Im glad beeing connected with so many people all over the world

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I have my own small business so I know that its a tough time in the beginning. I also know that it is very satisfying to build a business that you can have your income from.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I can't help one person by myself, but with all of my friends, we can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Deputy with Greenville County Sheriff's Dept.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm more fortunate than others and this seems like a direct way of making a contribution.

lender.name: BarbD
lender.occupation: math, art, trucking, writing... what don't I do?
lender.loan_because: Karma

lender.name: Herb - Jarobux Team
lender.loan_because: As a family of Jesus followers, we have formed the Jarobux Team to help the poor around the world. While there are many ways to help poor people, loans are attractive because of the potential for sustained economic health for the recipients, and that the loans are re-used for others.
lender.occupational_info: I direct the efforts of my church to help people in regions throughout the world.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I heard Bill Clinton supports this concept and I'm grateful he took an interest in Ireland. Also, I'm a small-time entrepreneur myself and see this as a constructive way of showing the underdeveloped world that the developed world does care.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company selling and installing home improvement products.

lender.name: alispiritato
lender.loan_because: it helps me to feel connected to the rest of the world and I hope that the reverse is true - the entrepreneurs feels connected to the lenders. It's Banking without Borders!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: spreading wealth around the world will create a better world
lender.occupational_info: I manage 5 companies that invest in real estate development and technology firms

lender.name: Skyler
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: frances
lender.loan_because: it was originally a gift from me to my nephew that he did not redeem.
lender.occupational_info: help take care of sick people

lender.name: Bruno & Celia
lender.loan_because: We loan beacuse we believe that everyone deserves a chance to change the course of his life, and we who were born blessed have a duty to help.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I believe in helpoing others to be able to sustain their lives.
lender.occupational_info: In this section of Kentucky (a small state in America) I am trying to enlighten my region to the beauty of diversity of our people through art and education.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems like an great way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Law Clerk for a State Court Judge

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others who need a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I build business relationships that drive more business for both my company and our partners.

lender.name: ner
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring
lender.occupational_info: I wait for people. Its not so fun, but I can give with the tip I make

lender.name: Dana
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to children and adults.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: i love helping people
lender.occupational_info: s student

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am so proud of my teenage daughter because for my Christmas gift she chose to make a loan in my name .

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising...I help business grow.

lender.name: SKAK
lender.loan_because: Because we have been given much, we too must give!

lender.name: Chris Heiler
lender.loan_because: I like to support other entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Professional landscape designer who designs gardens for traditionally-styled homes built in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Helping others is a way I show Heavenly Father I am grateful for all he has blessed me with.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I'm just one (1) of six (6) billion people trying to have a meaningful existence on this planet.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I would rather lend to an individual who is trying to better himself.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: Je crois qu'il s'agit de la manire faon de supporter ceux qui ont de bonnes ides, mais qui n'ont malheureusement pas accs au crdit le permettant d'atteindre leurs objectifs.

lender.name: Gerard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people for a better life

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense!
lender.occupational_info: I spend time trying to help people

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Once I found out about KIVA, I felt there was no option but to loan. What a great way to lend a hand to people and their communities around the world!

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: A friend gave me $25 credit for a loan. I think this is a wonderful program and I will continue to support it and recommend it to friends.
lender.occupational_info: I was the principal's secretary and an advisor at a high school. I am now retired but I worked with teenagers for 27 years.

lender.name: Jay & Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I am a steward of God's resources and view lending as a tool for his Glory to be shared with all.
lender.occupational_info: I serve others.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: This is the most useful thing I have discovered on the internet

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: dont work

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I think that providing loans to individuals is a great way to fight poverty. The hard work, honesty, and repayment history of the borrowers makes this inspiring.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their money.

lender.name: Blair
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps teacher in a Tanzanian village and still wish villagers all the best.
lender.occupational_info: I write books about science.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: There is very unequal distribution of resources across the globe. I cannot offer much monetary support, but I'd like to have a connection to help people live in healthy, sustainable communities.
lender.occupational_info: I write news about health and medicine.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: there is no greater gift than kindness.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Im from Norway. Here you could even make ok it without a job. It could just as well been me who was born in a poor country.
lender.occupational_info: Im a serviceconsultant, helping people with all kinds of questions regarding my municipality. Im also a hobby musician, making electronic music.

lender.name: Mikel
lender.occupational_info: I plan for sustainable water resources in a region of Florida

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: my lack of income is in no way the same as anothers. I still receive what I need daily, and thank God that I can pass a bit more on to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be an experiential education teacher.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: Semiconductor manufacturing

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Although I am not wealthy, I have much to be grateful for, and the best way I know to express gratitude is to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired minister of the United Church of Canada. I enjoy volunteering my time in the community.

lender.name: Ann-Marie & Rob
lender.loan_because: We want to show faith in others - helping them to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: We are both teachers who have spent our lives working with young people to help them realize how valuable they can be to others.

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: It's amazing to be able to make a tangible difference to someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make their marketing budgets deliver better return on investment.

lender.name: Hilda
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of Mom

lender.name: PHUONG
lender.loan_because: What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others.

lender.name: jonathan and christa
lender.loan_because: it feels right.
lender.occupational_info: technical

lender.name: ujang
lender.loan_because: i need loans for open my service shop
lender.occupational_info: everything good jobs

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I'm really interested to see what Kiva can do, if the model is sustainable, if microfinance can be more than a development buzzword and actually make a genuine difference to those in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an IT worker with a passion for travel, also studying International Studies.

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I appreciate those who work hard.

lender.name: Chad and Heidi
lender.loan_because: We have traveled around the world, and it has reinforced to us how fortunate we are to have everything that we do. We love the idea of helping people make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Chad works on the Yahoo! search engine, helping to make sure it returns the best possible results for users. Heidi works at Adify, which helps entrepreneurs and companies build vertical ad networks.

lender.name: Brian & Angie
lender.loan_because: Sometimes it only takes a little support to do big things. We want to encourage the ambitious people that want to better their lives. We hope our loan will not only help the receiver but the community they live in as well.
lender.occupational_info: Brian works for a commercial construction company that builds hospitals, schools and other public buildings. Angie provides physical therapy in a school for students who are disabled.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can and do change the world every day by starting and runing their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help real people survive and thrive as independent consultants. I teach people how to start and run consulting businesses. I also run a small marketing consulting firm.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: it provides the opportunity to enable independence & self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: Regularly travel to developing countries, and witness the positive impact that even a small helping hand can make..but only if it's constructive, and this is the perfect tool.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: This is a way I can make a positive difference in someone's life. I believe in hope, trust and hard work to make one's life better.
